translation: The Extensive Ritual Procedure of the Mahāvairocanâbhisaṃbodhi-sūtra, Volume 2

source_sentence: 次當大日前　　般若波羅蜜
translation: Next, there will be a great day before the Prajñāpāramitā

source_sentence: 明妃契六臂　　三目皆圓滿
translation: Myōfei has six arms, and all three eyes are perfectly proportioned

source_sentence: 定羽掌梵夾　　慧羽竪護印
translation: Dīpaṃkara-vimala-nirdeśa-sūtra, the seal of the wisdom-feather protector

source_sentence: 次定仰臍輪　　慧羽垂與願
translation: second concentration, the navel-wheel, the feather of wisdom, and the vow

source_sentence: 二羽定慧手　　各結根本契
translation: two feathered hands of meditation and wisdom, each tying the fundamental knot

source_sentence: 身被堅甲冑　　是名諸佛母
translation: "A body covered in solid armor is called the mother of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 六波羅蜜印彼真言曰(真言玄如)　由印明力故　　相應身無二　當知此明妃　　三世諸佛母　圓滿薩般若爾時金剛手。
translation: "The six perfections are sealed with this true saying (Zhenyan Xuanru). Because of the power of the seal of illumination, there are no two bodies that correspond. You should know that this luminous consort is the mother of the buddhas of the three times. Perfectly completing the saṃgha prajñā then was Vajrapāṇi.

source_sentence: 昇於大日世尊身語意地。
translation: He rises to the level of the body, speech, and thought of the World Honored Sun.
He equally contemplated future sentient beings in terms of the equality of dharmas.
In order to end all doubt, he spoke, 'Great king of true words!'

source_sentence: 說大真言王曰(用羯磨印)。
translation: He spoke the great king of true words (using the sign of karma).

translation: "Acknowledge the command (1) Āsamāndharma-dharma-dhātu (2) Tiller-teng (Tejorā) Tiller-tanan (3) Sarvâstivāda (citation) (4) Kālôdayin (4) Kālôdayin (5) Kanyasô (6) Khakṣa (7) [mout*blue][mout*lok] (enter) (8) Wakṣa (enter) (9) Saṃsāra (2) He (10) Un [mout*blue][mout*lok] hāra (2) Saṃsāra (2) He (11) [mout*blue][mout*lok] Saṃsāra (2) He (12) then takes possession of the vajra-secret lord.
After speaking this true teaching, he said, "King of True Words!

source_sentence: 時一切如來住十方世界。
translation: At the time, all the tathāgatas were staying in the worlds of the ten directions.
Each one stretched out his right hand and rubbed his Vajra-holder's head.
They praised them with the voice, saying, "Good, good!
"Good, good, son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 汝已超昇毘盧遮那世尊身語意地。
translation: 'You've transcended the stage of the Bhagavān Vairocana's body, speech, and thought.
It's your intention to illuminate all places.

source_sentence: 住平等真言道諸菩薩故。
translation: It's because of the bodhisattvas who abide in the path of speaking the truth equally.
Up to the point where you're the same as the one who has correct universal knowledge.

source_sentence: 次傳八祕密　　於諸真言門
translation: Next, I'll transmit the eight mysteries at the gate of true speech.

source_sentence: 修行菩薩行　　諸菩薩應知
translation: bodhisattvas who are cultivating bodhisattva practices should know...

source_sentence: 觀於本尊身　　各堅固不動
translation: to contemplate the body of the original Buddha, each resolute and unmoving

source_sentence: 如本尊三昧　　如本尊觀住
translation: as-the-honored-samādhi as the honored one observes the abode

source_sentence: 而得成悉地　　諦觀白蓮華
translation: He attains the stage of accomplishment. He truly observes the white lotus flower.

source_sentence: 八葉皆廣大　　令普周法界
translation: the eight petals are all vast, allowing them to universally circumambulate the Dharma-realm

source_sentence: 東方葉華座　　觀[口*藍]字光輪　轉成如來身　　號寶幢如來　身色如日暉以定慧手作虛心合掌。
translation: "On his eastern leaf-flower throne, he contemplates the [mouth*blue] word wheel of light transforming into the body of the Tathāgata known as the Ratnaketu Tathāgata. His body is colored like a sunbeam, and his hands of concentration and wisdom form an open-minded palm.

source_sentence: 而散風輪地輪如放光焰。
translation: It radiates the wind-wheel and ground-wheel like flames of light.
This is the seal of the Bhagavān's authoritative power that arises.

source_sentence: 其曼荼羅三角而具光明。
translation: His maṇḍala is triangular and luminous.
He says, "This is the true saying.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)[口*藍][口*落](入)(二)娑嚩(二合)賀　南方葉華座　　觀鑁字光輪　轉成如來身　　名開敷華王　金色放光明　　三昧離諸垢即以此印而屈風輪。
translation: "Taking refuge in (1) [Mouth*Ram][Mouth*Lot] (Enter) (2) Śaṇḍa (b) He sits on a leafy flower throne in the south, observes the word ñahuatlapatra, transforms into the Tathāgata's body, and is called the flower king who spreads his golden radiance. Samādhi is freed from all defilements by this seal, which bends the wind-wheel.

source_sentence: 在二空輪上如嚩字形是世尊金剛不壞印。
translation: On top of the two empty wheels, it's shaped like the letter 'Va', which is the Bhagavān's indestructible seal.

source_sentence: 其曼荼羅如嚩字相有金剛光。
translation: His maṇḍala resembles the shape of the word 'va' and has a vajra glow.
He says, "This is the true mantra.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)鑁嚩(入)(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　北方葉華座　　觀唅字光輪　轉成鼓音王　　離惱清涼定即以此印屈二地輪。
translation: 歸命(一)鑁嚩(入)(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　北方葉華座　　觀唅字光輪　轉成鼓音王　　離惱清涼定即以此印屈二地輪。
Putting it in his palm, he inserts it.
This is the tathāgata's seal of adornment of myriad virtues.
Its maṇḍala is shaped like a half-moon.
It's shaped like a half-moon.
It's surrounded by a large, hollow dot.
The true saying is.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)唅鶴(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　西方葉華座　　觀糝字光輪　轉成無量壽　　色如閻浮金即以初印散水輪火輪。
translation: "Homage (1) to the crane (2) svāhā (2) to the lotus seat in the west, contemplating the incalculable wheel of light that will lead to measureless life and a form like jambu gold, that's when the first seal is applied to disperse the water wheel and fire wheel.
It's called the lotus treasury seal.
Its maṇḍala resembles the shape of a moon wheel.
It's surrounded by the bodhisattva flower.
The true saying is.

source_sentence: 歸命　糝索(入)(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　東南葉華座　　觀暗字光輪　轉成普賢身復以定慧手。
translation: "Acknowledging life, ñośoso (enter) (2) svāhā (2) he (citation needed), southeast of the leaf and flower throne, he observes the wheel of light from the word dark and transforms into the body of Samantabhadra.
He creates a lotus that's not yet open and joins his palms.
He establishes the two wheels of emptiness and bends them slightly.
This is the sign of the Tathāgata's all-embracing birth.

source_sentence: 其曼荼羅如迦羅捨滿月之形。
translation: The maṇḍala takes the shape of the full moon of Kālāśa.
It's surrounded by vajras.
He says, "This is the true mantra.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)暗噁(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　西北葉華座　　觀嚩字光輪　轉成聖者身　　號名觀自在　色如紅頗梨　　是名聖觀音即以此印屈其火輪餘相如前。
translation: "Avalokitêśvara(1), 'Kālāśa'(2), 'Saṃvaṃhā'(2), and 'Avalokitêśvara'(3). Northwest of the leafy flower seat, he transforms into the body of a sage who's called Avalokitêśvara and whose shape is like red phalli. This is called the holy Avalokitêśvara. He bends his fire wheel with this seal, and the rest of his body behaves as before.
This is the dhāraṇī mudrā of the Bhagavān.
The maṇḍala is like a rainbow.
It's completely surrounded by the hanging vajra banners.
He says, "This is the true saying.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)沒馱達囉抳(二)娑沒[口*栗](二合)底(丁以反)麼囉馱曩迦[口*履](三)馱囉野馱囉野薩鑁(四)婆誐嚩底(丁以反五)阿(引)迦(引)囉嚩底(六)三麼曳(七)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　西南葉華座　　觀阿字光輪　轉成文殊身　　所謂一切智　身如欝金色復以虛心合掌開散火輪。
translation: "Acknowledge the life of (1) Bṛhatdharāja (2) Sābhogakāṭī (2) Mālādhāra (2) Mālādhāra) (3) Dharāno-Dharāja (4) Bhagavatī (5) Ājagavatī (6) Samādhi (7) Sābhogakā (2) Hāra (7) The southwest leaf and flower seat, which observes the radiant wheel of the letter a, transforms into the body of Mañjuśrī, which is described as omniscience, and opens the fire wheel with his open palm as golden.

source_sentence: 其地輪與空輪和合持之。
translation: He combines the earth wheel with the air wheel and holds them together.
This is the tathāgata's seal of dharma-abiding.
The maṇḍala there is like space.
It's surrounded by a mixture of colors and has two points of emptiness.
The true saying is.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)阿吠娜尾泥(二)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　東北葉華座　　觀野字光輪　加以二昧聲　　轉成慈氏尊　大乘相應故　　身色如黃金二羽虛心合掌。
translation: "Homage (a) to Aparagodānīya (b) svāhā (btn) he (citation needed), the northeast leaf and flower seat, the meditative wheel of light, the sound of the word 'dharmadhātu,' and the transformation into the honored one of compassion, which is associated with the great vehicle. The body is colored like gold, and the two feathers are held together with an open heart.
He uses his hands of concentration and wisdom to support each other.
They then spin around on their own.
This is called the seal of the Bhagavān's swift empowerment.
He releases the maṇḍala, which also resembles space.
He adorns it with a blue dot.
He says, "This is the true mantra.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)摩賀瑜誐瑜(引)擬(宜以反)[寧*頁](二)瑜詣濕嚩(二合)[口*履](三)欠若唎計(四)娑嚩(二合)賀　中央法界性　　圓明廣大輪　輪中轉阿字　　成大法界身　號名遍照尊　　金色具暉曜　首持髮髻冠　　綃縠嚴身服　輝焰過眾電　　放種種色光　正受相應身　　寂然三摩地　應願濟群生　　大日正覺尊　以八曼荼羅　　種子字圍繞　甚深圓鏡中　　法界曼荼羅　猶如敬制底　　如來三密門　當依如是法彼大日真言曰曩莫薩嚩怛他(引)蘖帝[口*驃](毘庾反一)微濕嚩(二合)目契弊(毘也反二)薩嚩他(三)阿(上)阿(引)暗(去引)噁(入)(四)　行者若持誦　　乃至初安住　不生疑慮意　　隨取彼一心　以心置於心　　證於極淨句　無垢安不動　　不分別如鏡　現前甚微細　　若彼常觀察　修習而相應　　乃至本所尊　自身像皆現　　即是第一句　瑜伽阿闍梨　　當依第二句　於鏡曼荼羅　　作本尊三昧　觀心自圓明　　微妙如圓鏡　鏡中有八葉　　大寶蓮華王　白嚴好鬚蘂　　臺中有種子　轉種子色聲　　即大日如來　真實加持身　　即是正覺句　次應捧念珠　　菩提與蓮子　金剛光好者　　貫穿一百八　持珠當於心　　四時及三時　乃至於二時　　當心住等引　三麼呬多地　　念大日本明　一百或一千　　數滿三洛叉　作心意念誦　　出入息為一　短聲與長聲　　常一一相應　異此而受持　　真言闕支分　自尊為一相　　無二無取著　不壞意色像　　勿異於法則　次住巧智生　　說出生種種　善巧智百光　　遍照諸佛剎　二羽金剛合　　或作五智印　即置於頂上　　微加搖動之　彼百光遍照真言曰歸命(一)暗　此百字真言　　真言救世者　成就大威德　　法自在牟尼　破諸無智暗　　摧壞無智城　如日輪普現　　利益眾生故　念誦分限畢　　捧珠頂戴已　然後安本處　　重結大日印　入法界三昧　　行者出三昧　念本明七遍　　復結五供養　悅意妙五讚　　獻閼伽香水　當發五大願　　復結大三昧　左旋成解界　　當白眾聖尊　現前諸如來　　救世諸菩薩　乃至諸聖天　　不斷大乘教　到殊勝地者　　唯願聖天眾　決定證知我　　廣利諸有情　久久住世間　　佛說加持句　定慧金剛合　　隨明遍觸身　念彼密言曰歸命(一)薩嚩他(二)勝勝(三)怛[口*陵](二合)怛[口*陵](二合)(四)顒顒(五)達[口*憐](二合)達[口*憐](二合)(六)娑他(二合)波也娑他(二合)波也(七)沒馱薩底也(二合)嚩(八)達麼薩底也(二合)嚩(九)僧伽薩底也(二合)嚩(十)娑嚩(二合)迦嚩(十一)吽吽(十二)吠娜尾泥(十三)娑嚩(二合)賀　於頂上解之　　各隨其所安　皆令得解脫　　復結三昧耶　薩埵被甲冑　　三印等護持　法界字為頂　　功德悉成就　如前應作禮　　然後出道場　住於閑淨處　　轉讀修多羅　華嚴與涅槃　　楞伽思益等　願共諸有情　　同證華藏海　入佛無漏智大毘盧遮那經廣大儀軌卷下此法從摩訶毘盧遮那。

The second transmission of the Vajra Hand was from Mahāvairocana.

source_sentence: 付屬那爛陀寺達磨鞠多阿闍梨。
translation: He was entrusted to the Dharmakruta preceptor at Nālandā Temple.
Dharmagupta Ajari.

source_sentence: 次付屬中天竺國王種釋迦善無畏三藏。
translation: Next, he was entrusted to the Tripiṭaka of Shan Fearless, a royal lineage of the Śākyas in the Middle Kingdom of India.

source_sentence: 善無畏三藏開元中來至此國。
translation: The Samantabhadra of Fearlessness came to this country in the middle of the Kaiyuan period.

source_sentence: 當玄宗朝為大國師傳法灌頂。
translation: He was the great national teacher who transmitted the Dharma consecration during the reign of the Xuanzong emperor.

source_sentence: 次付屬海東新羅國僧玄超阿闍梨。
translation: Next, he was entrusted to the monk Xuanchao Ajari of Shiluo in the eastern part of the country.
The next transmission was from the Xuanchao Ajari.

source_sentence: 付屬京青龍寺僧慧果阿闍梨。
translation: He was entrusted to the priest Huiguo Ajari of Qinglong Temple in Jing.
The Huiguo Ajari then transmitted it to the next.
He gave it to the priest Hōrun Ajari.

source_sentence: 大和八年甲寅歲三月七日。
translation: On the seventh day of the third month of the eighth year of the reign of Kāin, he was entrusted to the five divisional preceptors of Huiri si.

source_sentence: 付屬慧日寺五部持念僧惟謹。
